short.first-p: I'am Full-Stack developer specializing in React and Node.js, passionate about building efficient tech solutions.
short.last-p: A skilled web developer with expertise in building modern and scalable web applications.

first-p.head: Front-End Development:
first-p.first-p: Proficient in React.js with Hooks and Redux for dynamic and fast UIs.
first-p.last-p: Experience with Next.js for SEO optimization and performance.

second-p.head: Back-End Development:
second-p.first-p: Develop RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express.js
second-p.last-p: Design relational databases with MySQL, and non-relational with MongoDB.

last-p.head: Additional Tools:
last-p.last-p: Writing clean code following best practices.

contact.head: Have you any project? Drop a message!
